Literature.Title: Development and evaluation of cationic amphiphilic antimicrobial 2,5-diketopiperazines
Literature.Author: Labrière C, Kondori N, Caous JS, Boomgaren M, Sandholm K, Ekdahl KN, Hansen JH, Svenson J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida albicans CCUG 32723(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida glabrata CCUG 35267(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis CCUG 32723(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida krusei CCUG 35869(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida tropicalis CCUG 34274(MIC=16µg/ml)
